# makeBuffer(length:options:placementSparsePageSize:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a new placement sparse buffer of a specific length.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeBuffer(length: Int, options: MTLResourceOptions = [], placementSparsePageSize: MTLSparsePageSize) -> (any MTLBuffer)?
```

## Parameters

- **length**: The size of the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLBuffer], in bytes.
- **options**: A [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLResourceOptions] instance that establishes the bufferâ€™s storage modes.
- **placementSparsePageSize**: [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLSparsePageSize] to use for the placement sparse buffer.

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLBuffer] instance, or `nil` if the function failed.

## Discussion

This method creates a new placement sparse [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLBuffer] of a specific length. You assign memory to placement sparse buffers using a [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLHeap] of type [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLHeapType/placement].
